meanings.sent1: The vet treated the dog for helminths.
meanings.sent2: The farmer found helminths in the soil.
meanings.sent3: The helminths in the garden were causing trouble for the plants.
meanings.sent4: The presence of helminths in the pond signaled an imbalance in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent5: Children were taught to wash their hands to avoid ingesting helminths.

meanings.definition: Any worm of the phylum Helminthes.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study different species of helminths to understand their impact.
meanings.sent2: The biology class learned about the diversity of helminths.
meanings.sent3: The helminths in the science experiment wriggled around in the petri dish.
meanings.sent4: The aquarium displayed a variety of helminths for educational purposes.
meanings.sent5: The textbook had detailed illustrations of various helminths for identification.
